posts.content:
FOR SALE is my very solid and straight 13 window deluxe,
I bought this from Ben Jones (Race Shack) 9years ago, and have added lots of goodies since then.
The cab has a full roll-cage, it is a Bus with Attitude having run 15.25secs up the strip when owned by Ben.
The front suspension is Red 9 Design with discs and coil over shocks and rack and pinion steering. There is also a disc lock fitted but not wired in. The rear suspension is IRS with Porsche 944 discs.
The motor is a very reliable 2110cc with twin Weber 44carbs, so the bus goes and stops well.
The cluth is a Kennedy stage2.
I will give you full spec of engine if you phone me.

At the same time all this was being done a new wiring loom was also fitted, (there is provision for a leisure battery)
The wheels are 15inch BRM's

The interior has porsche leather(blue) up front with a Gene Berg shifter and Moto-lita steering wheel. The rear has carpet and a rock and roll bed. All the interior panels are a very light ply and covered in stickers, but could be covered properly if that is your choice.
There is no stereo, just the music from the motor.

So to round up, this is a ratty looking but very solid van , with excellent mechanics.
I am only selling due to my age.
If you want pictures message me your email address or phone me on ...07886 036 860... for a chat.

I don't want this bus to hang around so i am asking what i believe to be a very fair price of ...Â£20, 000 firm. Thanks for reading , phone me for further details.
Thank you ,
Phill.






,
The Bus is now SOLD....Thanks or advert.
